name: A Carol of Ruin and Prosperity
name_original: A Carol of Ruin and Prosperity
description:
Nezer finds himself between two factions—two paths that might be the harbinger of a new future for us all. The choices you make throughout your adventure to elevate your skills will also catalyze a change in your environment, in which the world shall be overtaken by new, state-of-the-art technology, or will succumb to old machinery, forgotten by time, in its attempt to reclaim a world that once belonged to it. With the burden of this choice, where will you go?

Credits: 

  • PROGRAMMING Juan Rodríguez, Belén Vignolo
  • ANIMATION & PIXEL ART Valeria Sarro
  • CHARACTER DESIGN & 2D ART Florencia Leyton
  • UI & BACKGROUND ART Ivan Dominguez
  • MUSIC & SOUND EFFECTS Nicolas Perez
  • NEZER VOICE Nathan Fernandez @SwordDrako

This game was made in 48 hors as a part of the Global Game Jam 2022 under the theme "Duality"
